Description: Pottery ostracon with remains of 8 lines of text on the recto containing the beginning of a letter.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (337-338, pl.51)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82917) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82917)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II Ad 4 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
